title: welcome
description: The first post of the new blog.
contents: Welcome to my blog! After a long hiatus with publishing a blog, this is where I will be sharing updates, thoughts and code.

title: working with distill
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
